name: abyss
meaning: A deep or seemingly bottomless chasm
rap_meaning: The lowest point of the struggle, deep depression, the trap that's hard to escape
rhymes: END: miss, dis, hiss, kiss, bliss / SLANT: wrist / MULTI: paralysis
bars: Staring in the abyss, it stared back at me
Climbed out the abyss with dirt under my nails
Voice from the abyss, echoing the pain

name: accolade
meaning: Award or privilege granted as a special honor
rhymes: END: parade, charade, brigade, shade / SLANT: paid / MULTI: lemonade
bars: Don't do it for the accolade, do it for the love
Stacking accolades like plaques on the wall
Only accolade I need is my hood's respect

name: ace
meaning: Playing card with value 1 or 11; expert
rap_meaning: Number one, best friend (Ace boon coon), Ace of Spades (champagne)
rhymes: END: base, chase, face, race, case / SLANT: days / MULTI: interface
bars: Ace of Spades popping, celebration vibes
Keep an ace up the sleeve for the rainy day
I'm the ace in the deck, you just a joker

name: acid
rap_meaning: Tripping, burning through obstacles, toxic personality, Acid Rap (Chance)
rhymes: END: placid, flaccid / SLANT: massive / MULTI: antacid
bars: Flow like acid, burning through the floor
Acid trip visuals, colors in the air
Toxic like battery acid, keep your distance

name: acme
meaning: The point at which someone or something is best
rap_meaning: The peak, Looney Tunes explosives (Wile E. Coyote fake), top tier
rhymes: END: acne, hackney / SLANT: back me / MULTI: attack me
bars: Reached the acme, look down on the rest
Your trap look like Acme, cartoon explosives
Standard is acme, nothing less accepted

name: acoustics
meaning: Properties of a room that determine how sound is transmitted
rap_meaning: How the gun sounds, studio quality, echoing in empty spaces
rhymes: END: logistics, statistics, ballistics / SLANT: sticks / MULTI: linguistics
bars: Fix the acoustics, I need to hear the truth
Pistol acoustics, echoing in the alley
Bathroom acoustics flow, raw and uncluttered

name: acrobat
meaning: An entertainer who performs gymnastic feats
rap_meaning: Flipping money, flexible flows, bending over backwards
rhymes: END: habitat, aristocrat, diplomat / SLANT: bat / MULTI: copycat
bars: Money do acrobat flips, gymnastics
Lyrical acrobat, walking the tightrope
Bending over backwards like an acrobat for nothing

name: acrylic
meaning: Plastic substance used for paint or nails
rhymes: END: idyllic, cyrillic / SLANT: kill it / MULTI: acidic
bars: Heart made of acrylic, see through and plastic
Click-clack of the acrylics, she typing a text
Painting vivid pictures, acrylic on canvas

name: action
meaning: Fact or process of doing something
rap_meaning: Action movies, about that action (fighting/doing), gun play
rhymes: END: faction, traction, reaction / SLANT: ask him / MULTI: satisfaction
bars: Lights, camera, action, movie life
Don't talk about it, be about that action
Missing in action when the beef kicked off

name: activist
rap_meaning: Freedom fighter, fighting the power, sipping Actavis (lean)
rhymes: END: pacifist, masochist / SLANT: wrist / MULTI: protagonist
bars: Sipping Activist, leaning like an activist
Voice of the people, neighborhood activist
Social activist until the check clears
